description: Validates document structure and compliance: cover page, slide 2, and back page

glossaries.risk_profile: Risk profile description conforming to prospectus

rules.description: The cover page must clearly display the name of the fund
rules.impact: Fund identification is essential for document clarity
rules.error_message: Fund name is missing from the cover page
rules.remediation: Add the fund name to the cover page

rules.rule_text: Must indicate the month and year
rules.description: The cover page must display the publication date (month and year)
rules.impact: Date is crucial for document version tracking
rules.error_message: Publication date (month and year) is missing from the cover page
rules.remediation: Add the current month and year to the cover page

rules.description: The cover page must include a clear designation that this is promotional material
rules.remediation: Add 'Promotional Document' designation to the cover page

rules.rule_text: Must indicate the target audience: retail or professional
rules.description: The cover page must specify whether the document is intended for retail or professional clients
rules.impact: Essential for regulatory compliance and target audience identification
rules.remediation: Clearly specify whether the document is for retail or professional clients

rules.rule_text: For pre-commercialisation funds: display in red and bold on the cover page a disclaimer warning
rules.description: Pre-commercialisation funds must include a prominent disclaimer indicating the fund has not yet been approved by regulators
rules.error_message: Pre-commercialisation disclaimer is missing or not properly formatted
rules.remediation: Add the required disclaimer in red and bold text
rules.required_content: PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS FUND HAS NOT YET BEEN APPROVED BY THE FINANCIAL MARKET AUTHORITY (to be adapted according to regulator) AND HAS NOT BEEN AUTHORIZED FOR MARKETING IN FRANCE OR IN OTHER MEMBER STATES OF THE EUROPEAN UNION OR IN ANY OTHER JURISDICTION. INVESTORS DECLARE AND ACKNOWLEDGE THAT NO OFFER OR PLACEMENT OR DIRECT OR INDIRECT SOLICITATION HAS BEEN MADE AT THE INITIATIVE OF THE MANAGEMENT COMPANY. THIS PRESENTATION IS SUBMITTED TO YOU ON A CONFIDENTIAL BASIS AND SOLELY FOR DISCUSSION PURPOSES. IT DOES NOT CONSTITUTE AN OFFER OR AN INVITATION TO SUBSCRIBE FOR UNITS OF THE FUND. THE INFORMATION PRESENTED HEREIN SHOULD NOT BE USED TO SUBSCRIBE FOR UNITS OF THE FUND AND MAY BE SUBJECT TO MODIFICATION.

rules.rule_text: Mention 'do not disclose' if professional document
rules.description: Professional documents must include a confidentiality notice stating that the document should not be disclosed
rules.error_message: Confidentiality notice 'do not disclose' is missing from professional document
rules.remediation: Add a 'Do Not Disclose' or 'Confidential' notice to the cover page

rules.rule_text: For client-specific documents: indicate the client name
rules.description: If the document is prepared for a specific client, the client's name must be displayed on the cover page
rules.impact: Ensures correct document routing and personalization
rules.error_message: Client name is missing from a client-specific document
rules.remediation: Add the client name to the cover page if this is a customized document
rules.condition: Only applies if document is client-specific

rules.rule_text: Standard disclaimer (retail or professional) must be present - adapt fund name and eligible clients
rules.description: Slide 2 must contain the appropriate standard disclaimer based on target audience, with customization for fund name and eligibility
rules.impact: Required for regulatory compliance and investor protection

cross_references.note: Use retail disclaimer for retail clients
Use professional disclaimer for professional clients

rules.error_message: Standard disclaimer is missing or not properly customized
rules.remediation: Add the appropriate disclaimer from glossary and customize for fund and eligible clients

rules.rule_text: Complete list of risk profile conforming to prospectus
rules.description: Slide 2 must exhaustively list the risk profile as defined in the fund prospectus
rules.impact: Essential for investor risk awareness and regulatory compliance
rules.error_message: Risk profile is incomplete or does not match prospectus
rules.remediation: Review prospectus and ensure all risk factors are listed

rules.description: Slide 2 must list all countries where the fund is registered or approved for commercialisation
rules.error_message: Commercialisation countries list is missing or does not match reference data
rules.remediation: Update countries list based on registration_abroad.xlsx file

rules.rule_text: Legal mention of the management company (SGP)
rules.description: The back page must include the required legal mention of the management company

cross_references.note: Use standardized legal mention from glossary

rules.error_message: Legal mention of management company is missing
rules.remediation: Add the required legal mention from glossary to the back page

critical.description: Must be corrected immediately - regulatory or legal requirement

major.description: Should be corrected - important compliance requirement

minor.description: Nice to have - best practice recommendation
